Node.Title: Belts & Extractors
Node.Description: Allows shapes to be extracted and transported.

Node.Title: Half Destroyer
Node.Description: Destroys the <color=#FFA036>WEST HALF</color> of any shape, outputting what remains.

SideGoals.Title: Cutting Speed 1
SideGoals.Description: Increases cutting speed by additive 50 %.

Node.Title: 90° CW Rotator
Node.Description: Rotates a shape <color=#FFA036>90° clockwise</color>.

SideGoals.Title: Belt Speed 1
SideGoals.Description: Increases belt speed by additive 50 %.

Node.Title: 2nd Floor
Node.Description: Unlocks the second floor, allowing you to route belts efficiently.

Node.Title: Stacker
Node.Description: Unlocks the Stacker, allowing shapes to be stacked/combined.

SideGoals.Title: Stacking Speed 1
SideGoals.Description: Increases stacking speed by additive 50 %.

SideGoals.Title: Trash
SideGoals.Description: Destroys items.

SideGoals.Title: 90° CCW Rotator
SideGoals.Description: Rotates a shape <color=#FFA036>90° counter-clockwise</color>.

SideGoals.Title: Cutter
SideGoals.Description: Separates the <color=#FFA036>WEST HALF</color> of any shape from the <color=#FFA036>EAST HALF</color>, and outputs both separately.

Node.Title: Blueprints
Node.Description: Allows you to copy/paste parts of your factory.

SideGoals.Title: Swapper
SideGoals.Description: Receives two shapes and <color=#FFA036>swaps their WEST HALVES</color>, outputting the results in parallel and allowing for <color=#FFA036>more efficient processing</color>.

SideGoals.Title: Cutting Speed 2
SideGoals.Description: Increases cutting speed by additive 50 %.

SideGoals.Title: Blueprint Discount 1
SideGoals.Description: Makes Blueprints free up to a certain amount of structures.

Node.Title: Space Platforms
Node.Description: Allows new space platforms to be built, expanding your factory.

SideGoals.Title: Platform Layouts 1
SideGoals.Description: Unlocks a larger space platform layout.

SideGoals.Title: Belt Speed 2
SideGoals.Description: Increases belt speed by additive 50 %.

SideGoals.Title: More Vortex Inputs 1
SideGoals.Description: Increases the size of the Vortex to allow for more inputs.

Node.Title: Platform Limit 1
Node.Description: Increase the maximum amount of space platform units you can place.

SideGoals.Title: Stacking Speed 2
SideGoals.Description: Increases stacking speed by additive 50 %.

SideGoals.Title: 180° Rotator
SideGoals.Description: Rotates a shape <color=#FFA036>180°</color>.

Node.Title: Fluids & Painting
Node.Description: Allows you to extract fluids & color shapes.

SideGoals.Title: Fluid Packing
SideGoals.Description: Packages fluids, allowing them to be transported between space platforms as well as trains.

SideGoals.Title: Platform Limit 2
SideGoals.Description: Increase the maximum amount of space platform units you can place.

SideGoals.Title: Painting Speed 1
SideGoals.Description: Increases painting speed by additive 50 %.

SideGoals.Title: Fluid Tank
SideGoals.Description: Allows fluids to be stored.

Node.Title: Floor 3
Node.Description: Unlocks the third floor including 2-floor lifts.

SideGoals.Title: Fluid Package Size 1
SideGoals.Description:
<color=#FF2C63>This content is work in progress and might get reworked at any time. Please give feedback in the shapez 2 discord!</color>

Increases the maximum capacity of Fluid Packages used by packers & unpackers

SideGoals.Title: Platform Layouts 2
SideGoals.Description: Unlocks a larger space platform layout.

SideGoals.Title: Pump & Packing Speed 1
SideGoals.Description: Increases fluid packing & pump speed by additive 50 %.

SideGoals.Title: Blueprint Discount 2
SideGoals.Description: Makes Blueprints free up to a certain amount of structures.

Node.Title: Trains
Node.Description: Allows massive amounts of shapes to be transported over long distance.

Separates the <color=#FFA036>top layer</color> of a shape and outputs it in parallel.

SideGoals.Description: Paints <color=#FFA036>all layers</color> of a shape.

SideGoals.Title: Pump & Packing Speed 2
SideGoals.Description: Increases fluid packing & pump speed by additive 50 %.

SideGoals.Title: Belt Speed 3
